name: Automatic Ball Launcher for Dogs, Dog Ball Thrower with 40-60-80Ft Distance, Rechargeable Automatic Launcher with 4 Balls (2.5"), Remote Control Launcher for Medium & Large
short_description: 🐶Automatic Ball Launcher for Dogs: This automatic dog ball launcher is designed for medium to large dogs. The dog ball thrower launcher automatically launches 2.5inch dog balls and throws them over a long distance, stimulating the dog's nature of chasing and jumping. Meeting their needs for active play helps keep them physically healthy and mentally active.

🐶 3 Adjustable Launch Distances: This dog ball launcher offers three different launch distances – 40 feet, 60 feet, and 80 feet. You can easily select your desired distance to accommodate different play areas and your dog's energy level. Whether it's a small backyard or a large park, this tennis ball launcher for dogs will keep your dog active and happy.

🐶 4 High Quality 2.5 Inch Balls: These dog balls are made of high-quality E-TPU, which has excellent wear and bite resistance. The wear-resistant and bite-resistant properties ensure that the dog ball can withstand your dog's intense play. The 2.5-inch size is safer than other balls, reducing the risk of suffocation so you can let your dog play with confidence.

🐶Remote Control Convenience: With the remote control, you can easily serve the ball and adjust the launch distance without having to bend down. This flexibility allows you to adjust your play style to suit your dog's energy level and space, allowing you to fully unleash your dog's energy. Please note that you need to purchase AA batteries for the remote control.

🐶Practical Gift Options for Dogs: If you are looking for a gift for your dog or dog family, this automatic dog ball launcher is ideal. It combines practicality and entertainment, providing dogs with plenty of exercise and fun time. The automatic dog ball thrower is a special gift for dogs, just like giving them a joy that they will never get tired of.

🟠Note: It is recommended to use a 9V2A (18W) charger to charge the automatic dog ball launcher. This ball thrower for dogs is recommended for use in open outdoor areas. If you need any help or have any questions during use, please feel free to contact us and we will provide a satisfactory solution in a timely manner.

name: uahpet Automatic Ball Launcher for Dog with Obstacle Detection, 20ft-80ft Adjustable Distances Ball Thrower Launcher for Medium & Large Dogs with 3Balls (2.5 inches)
short_description: Smart Obstacle Detection for Pet Safety – Let your dog play freely while the iRetriever does the watching! Its built-in obstacle detection sensor instantly pauses or redirects the launch whenever a pet or person is detected in front, ensuring a safe fetch experience every time.

Two Fun Launch Modes – Choose between Forward Mode for straight-line fetch training and Random Mode for unpredictable launches to the left, center, or right. These interactive play styles keep your dog active and entertained.

Four Adjustable Distances – The iRetriever dog ball thrower offers distance settings from 20ft to 80ft, creating the perfect play zone for your dog. Whether in your living room, backyard, or park, you can easily match the distance to your space and your dog’s energy level.

Premium eTPU Balls Included – No more soggy, torn tennis balls! The iRetriever comes with premium eTPU balls engineered to resist wear and maintain their bounce over time. Designed for high-energy fetch sessions that last and last!

Powerful Battery for Extended Playtime - Equipped with a 4000mAh rechargeable battery, the iRetriever supports up to 800 launches on a single charge. No cords, no limits—just uninterrupted fun and bonding time with your furry friend.

name: Cheerble Smart Interactive Dog Toy, Wicked Ball AIR, Automatic Moving, Bouncing, and Rotating, E-TPU Material, IPX7 Waterproof Rating, Active Rolling Ball for Medium and Large Dogs
short_description: Enhanced Interactive Play: Cheerble’s most popular interactive dog toy, the Wicked Ball, is back with a new upgrade! Made with an ultralight, 100% pet-safe, and bite-resistant E-TPU outer shell, it still offers 3 switchable modes to match your dog's play style. Plus, you can easily replace the shell when needed!

3 Interactive Modes: You can easily switch modes (Normal, Passive, Gentle) to match your dog's play style and energy level. This toy offers mental stimulation and endless fun, perfect for keeping your dog happy and entertained.

Pet-safe, Durable, & Uniquely Versatile: The replaceable outer shell is crafted from super chew-proof, eco-friendly E-TPU—safe for your pup and built to last. What’s more, swap the shell to transform Wicked Ball Air into Wicked Ball Air Rope or Wicked Rugby instantly! This 3-in-1 interactive flexibility lets you unlock endless play styles, and it’s an exclusive feature only Cheerble offers.

Ideal for Medium-Large Breeds: With a 3.2-inch diameter, the Wicked Ball AIR is perfect for dogs weighing 35 lbs or more. We recommend that pet owners supervise their dogs while they play and teach their pets how to properly interact with the ball, rather than just chewing on it. This also helps strengthen the bond between you and your dog.

Easy to Clean & USB-C Rechargeable: Cleaning the Wicked Ball is a breeze. Simply wipe off any dirt and rinse the outer shell after making sure it's screwed on tightly. Wicked Ball Air provides 1 to 3.5 hours of playtime on a single charge. Recharging is easy with the included Type-C cable, taking just 50 minutes for a full charge.
After-sales Service: If you receive a defective ball or charging cable, please feel free to contact us. We will send you a replacement right away.

name: PetDroid Interactive Dog Toys Dog Ball,[Newly Upgraded] Durable Motion Activated Automatic Rolling Ball Toys for/Small/Medium/Large Dogs,USB Rechargeable (Blue)
short_description: 【Two modes available】Irregular Rolling Mode:Press the first button ( Blue light), and it will automatically move and rotate for 25 seconds, then stop for 5 seconds, repeating this cycle for a total of 2 minutes before entering standby mode. Crazy Bouncing Mode:Press the second button (Red light), and it will bounce for 10 seconds, stop for 5 seconds, repeating this cycle. It operates for a total of 1 minute before entering standby mode

【Suitable for multiple sites】Irregular running mode doesn’t work with the tennis cover,for hard floors only,and not for chewers. The tennis cover could only work under crazy bouncing mode，special for slight chewers,better work on thin carpet or a lawn outdoor for lower noise.

【Motion-Activated Toy】Equipped with a built-in motion sensor, this toy automatically rolls and rotates for 2 minutes or bounces crazily for 1 minute when your dog touches or bites it, then enters standby mode. The ball has built-in multi-color flashing lights that can attract more attention and bring more joy to your dogs
【USB Rechargeable】Built with 600mAh battery, charging 1.5 hours, working for 4 hours continuously
【Durable & Safe Materials】PetDroid interactive dog ball toy is made from durable polyamides that are safe and non-toxic. However, please note that the toy is not suitable for aggressive chewers
【Water-repellent】Waterproof:IP54. Meet the requirements for indoor and outdoor use
【Package Include】Interactive dog ball toy,tennis cover,USB cable,user manual
【LIFETIME NO RETURN CHANGE】We provide free change to our customer without returning bad ones in 1 year
【Tips】Please select the bouncing mode and put on the ball cover when using it on the carpet.

short_description: [3 Adjustable Launch Modes Up to 64ft] Choose from three distance settings: random (10–64ft), 32ft, and 64ft. Designed for interactive fetch games, it automatically launches balls to satisfy your dog’s natural chasing and jumping instincts. Keeps your pet active, healthy, and happy while saving your arm from endless throws.

[Safe, Durable & Pet-Friendly Materials] Made from sturdy, pet-safe materials, this launcher is designed for long-lasting durability and a safe play experience.
